about_the_game:
Welcome to the desert! This demo includes the first Act of the game, and gives you a taste of everything the game has to offer.

Your progress will be saved and will carry over into the full game if you choose to buy it afterwards.
detailed_description:
Welcome to the desert! This demo includes the first Act of the game, and gives you a taste of everything the game has to offer.

Your progress will be saved and will carry over into the full game if you choose to buy it afterwards.
name: A Day of Maintenance Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
